name: Life Sucks - As Luck Would Have It - A Demo
name_original: Life Sucks - As Luck Would Have It - A Demo
description:
Henry is a young musician who, despite having life solved, doesn't really know what to do with it. Sure, there's stuff to be had and bought, women to be with, booze to drink, and time to waste.

But isn't there supposed to be something else to life?

The first demo visual novel developed by Lirina Tales to try out TyranoBuilder, and get used to this form of storytelling.
